description: A sensor failure (broken or short circuit) occurred.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD LHX-MIB::lhxSensorFailure LHX-MIB::deviceName s EXAMPLE RFC1213-MIB::sysContact s EXAMPLE RFC1213-MIB::sysName s EXAMPLE RFC1213-MIB::sysLocation s EXAMPLE LHX-MIB::deviceInetAddressType i 0 LHX-MIB::deviceInetIPAddress s EXAMPLE LHX-MIB::agentInetPortNumber u 9999 LHX-MIB::lhxErrorCode s EXAMPLE LHX-MIB::portId i 1 LHX-MIB::probeId s EXAMPLE

description: The user-defined name for the Device.
variables.name: LHX-MIB::deviceName

description: The textual identification of the contact person
for this managed node, together with information
on how to contact this person.
variables.name: RFC1213-MIB::sysContact

description: An administratively-assigned name for this
managed node. By convention, this is the node's
fully-qualified domain name.
variables.name: RFC1213-MIB::sysName

description: The physical location of this node (e.g.
`telephone closet, 3rd floor').
variables.name: RFC1213-MIB::sysLocation

description: The type of address format
variables.name: LHX-MIB::deviceInetAddressType

description: The current IP address. A value of 0.0.0.0 indicates an error
or an unset option.
variables.name: LHX-MIB::deviceInetIPAddress

description: The UDP port number used for accessing
the SNMP agent on the device.
Examples:
If the associated device MIB (PX2-MIB, EMD-MIB) has deviceCascadeType set to portForwarding, then
master: 50500
slave 1:50501
slave 2: 50502
If cascading mode is not portForwarding and default (Standard) ports are being used, then
port: 161
variables.name: LHX-MIB::agentInetPortNumber

description: The LHX error code (F1 - F25, EP).
variables.name: LHX-MIB::lhxErrorCode

description: A unique value for the physical port, the LHX controlller
is connected to.
Its value ranges between 1 and the value of portCount.
variables.name: LHX-MIB::portId

description: The physical Sensor ID (F1 - F7).
variables.name: LHX-MIB::probeId

description: A fan motor failure occurred.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD LHX-MIB::lhxFanFailure LHX-MIB::deviceName s EXAMPLE RFC1213-MIB::sysContact s EXAMPLE RFC1213-MIB::sysName s EXAMPLE RFC1213-MIB::sysLocation s EXAMPLE LHX-MIB::deviceInetAddressType i 0 LHX-MIB::deviceInetIPAddress s EXAMPLE LHX-MIB::agentInetPortNumber u 9999 LHX-MIB::lhxErrorCode s EXAMPLE LHX-MIB::portId i 1 LHX-MIB::fanId s EXAMPLE

variables.name: LHX-MIB::deviceInetIPAddress

description: The UDP port number used for accessing
the SNMP agent on the device.
Examples:
If the associated device MIB (PX2-MIB, EMD-MIB) has deviceCascadeType set to portForwarding, then
master: 50500
slave 1:50501
slave 2: 50502
If cascading mode is not portForwarding and default (Standard) ports are being used, then
port: 161
variables.name: LHX-MIB::agentInetPortNumber

description: The LHX error code (F1 - F25, EP).
variables.name: LHX-MIB::lhxErrorCode

description: A unique value for the physical port, the LHX controlller
is connected to.
Its value ranges between 1 and the value of portCount.
variables.name: LHX-MIB::portId

description: An ST-Bus communication error was detected.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD LHX-MIB::lhxStBusError LHX-MIB::deviceName s EXAMPLE RFC1213-MIB::sysContact s EXAMPLE RFC1213-MIB::sysName s EXAMPLE RFC1213-MIB::sysLocation s EXAMPLE LHX-MIB::deviceInetAddressType i 0 LHX-MIB::deviceInetIPAddress s EXAMPLE LHX-MIB::agentInetPortNumber u 9999 LHX-MIB::lhxErrorCode s EXAMPLE LHX-MIB::portId i 1

description: The sensor reading.
This parameter does not apply to state sensors.

description: The sensor state.

description: The old sensor state used in

description: The operational state of the lhx controller.
To switch LHX power state while controller is connected
set operationalState to 1 (off) or 2 (on).
Switching power state while LHX is disconnected or to
0 (disconnected) is undefined.
variables.name: LHX-MIB::operationalState

description: The old operational state used in Operational State Transition traps.
variables.name: LHX-MIB::oldOperationalState

description: The supply voltage of an LHX became low.
